name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ruben MASCITTI, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ruben MASCITTI, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The order of the Superior Court is reversed, judgment of sentence is vacated and the case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Crawford County to reinstate Petitioner’s plea of nolo contendere and for imposition of sentence.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
546 A.2d 619
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Ruben MASCITTI, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 31, 1988.
